channel.title: R.I.P Runescape 03-07
channel.description:
[B]EVERYONE STFU ABOUT THE RIGHT FUCKING CLICK IT WAS FROM MY SEVER I AM USING FUCKING DEOB RIGHT NOW IT WAS JUST THERE SO THIS TOPIC DIDNT GET FUCKING LOCKED[/B]
so Before you read the features and comment please note this i don't care if it has been done before and if its shit or not and care what base im using so enjoy. This project will contain all of old runescape before godswords, godwars, and pvp armour and customs and shit like that. This will be strictly just bringing back the old days. When there was castle wars, duel arena, barbarian assault, fight pits, and jad.
[B]Base[/B] - Delta Cleaned by Teh Johnny [B]Client[/B] - have not picked yet [B][U]Key[/U][/B] Green - Complete Red - Working On Black - Haven't started
[U][B]Here is what we will contain in the source:[/B][/U]
[B][U]Skills[/U][/B] Runecrafting Theiving [COLOR=Green]Heblore[/COLOR] - Credits to Jeff Farming Mining [COLOR=Red]Smithing[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Fletching[/COLOR] Slayer Agility [COLOR="Red"]Firemaking[/COLOR] Fishing [COLOR="Red"]Cooking[/COLOR] Woodcutting
[B][U]Combat[/U][/B] Attack Strength Defence Range Magic Prayer
[U][B]Minigames[/B][/U] Castle Wars Duel Arena Fight Pits Jad Pest Control Barrows Maybe a Few custom minigames?
[B][U]Client[/U][/B] Old Gameframe with a bit customized No Peity or Chivalry No items Kept on Death Probbly some items from a 420 (The appernce)
[B][U]Server Protection[/U][/B] Anti Ddos Anti Syi Anti Null Anti Dupe
[B][U]Media[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/igxm4h.jpg[/img] more comming later
[B][U]How to apply?[/U][/B] [code]Name - How long can you work for a day - Experince in coding - Source or Client - Why you want to join -[/code]

item.title: R.I.P Runescape 03-07
item.dc:creator: @destroynoobz destroynoobz
item.description:
@destroynoobz wrote:

EVERYONE STFU ABOUT THE RIGHT FUCKING CLICK IT WAS FROM MY SEVER I AM USING FUCKING DEOB RIGHT NOW IT WAS JUST THERE SO THIS TOPIC DIDNT GET FUCKING LOCKED

so Before you read the features and comment please note this i don’t care if it has been done before and if its shit or not and care what base im using so enjoy.
This project will contain all of old runescape before godswords, godwars, and pvp armour and customs and shit like that. This will be strictly just bringing back the old days. When there was castle wars, duel arena, barbarian assault, fight pits, and jad.

Base - Delta Cleaned by Teh Johnny
Client - have not picked yet
Key
Green - Complete
Red - Working On
Black - Haven’t started
